svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2022-08-21T19:24:45.029Z" agent="5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_7) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/15.6 Safari/605.1.15" etag="6fdNNoePZtkuqjHOE1ep" version="20.2.3" type="google"><diagram id="DRL2sWwR3zsllqZYK9_9" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 741px; margin-left: 474px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 601px; margin-left: 46px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

b.font: $ 6 Load new pattern, set start/end, playhead

div.font: 1. If T (Follow mode enabled), update Z with arranger pattern. Set J to current pattern (Z) length stored in PN 1
2. K = current pattern * 8, clear and set looper BTN
3. Set chord pattern start/end
4. Move chord pattern playhead to start of sequence
5. Run $ 7 in an 8x loop to update all rows beginning at P.START
6. If Follow mode enabled, set D to the upcoming pattern

switch.text: $ 6 Load new pattern, set start/end, playhead...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 101px; margin-left: 792px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 601px; margin-left: 1486px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.b: $ 9/M Get next chord, send to chord player, update chord & arranger playheads

div.font: 1. J = next chord (raw 0-14), C = if J > 0, set wrap J (1-7)
2. A = chord octave; If J > 0, call $ 2 (chord player) X times
3. Clear chord grid playhead
4. Update chord grid playhead
5. Clear arranger playhead
6. Update new arranger playhead position

switch.text: $ 9/M Get next chord, send to chord player, update chord...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 601px; margin-left: 1006px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1. J = Called by looper BTNs? Clear next pattern LEDs
2. K = BTNI. Set dim LED for next pattern
3. If NOT looper BTN, BRK
4. (Looper BTN cont.) Write looper end position to PN 1, clear looper LEDs
5. Draw looper range BTNs
6. Set chord pattern end

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 319px; margin-left: 2432px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Pattern BTN

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 441px; margin-left: 2392px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
div.font: .EN BTNs

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 687px; margin-left: 948px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Lines 1/2

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 601px; margin-left: 526px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1. If chord/arranger switcher BTN was enabled in $ 5, J indicates if the current I from $ 5 is greater than 9 or less than 12 (groups we will be enabling/disabling)
2. (Else=called from $ 5) Enable/disable BTN/FDRs, BRK
3. Wrap for addressing rows 0-7
4. Update looper leds
5. If step's chord is 0, clear BTN
6. Set chord sequence BTNs

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 601px; margin-left: 1966px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1. J = BTNV with logic to always force 1 for step 1
2. K BTNI
3. Set values in PN 3
4. Set LEDs and find loop end
5. Set PN 3/Arranger loop
6. Update next pattern (D). Fire $ 8 to update pattern LEDs

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 937px; margin-left: 32px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Global Variables
A Chord octave (0/1)
B Prev chord
C Current chord
D Next pattern
X Intervals in chord (3/4)
Y Reset enabled
Z Current pattern
T Follow Arrangement T/F
R Flip each $ 1
PRT 7 Harmonizer intervals (3/4)
P 63/PRT 8 Scale (0-8)
PRT 9 Last sent velocity

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 131px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
div.font: On new pattern/reset

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 541px; margin-left: 1101px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Fake BTN.PR

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 46px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.b: $ 1 Advance chord pattern and handle TR.P 2

div.font: 1. I = end of chord pattern and in non-reset state (Y 0). Flip R
2. If at end of pattern, not in a reset state, and Follow is on, advance to next page and set J (current pattern) to pattern #.
3. If Resetting and Follow is enabled, go to arranger step 0 and set J to PN 3 0
4. If I OR in reset state (Y), run $ 6 to load new pattern, un-reset

font.span: - If in reset state, send trigger out to TR.P 2

div.font: 5. IF end of chord sequence & moving to a new pattern, TR.P 2
6. Log current pattern in K for next pass, emulate a button press for $ 8 flow (fake button), run $ 8 and $ 9

switch.text: $ 1 Advance chord pattern and handle TR.P 2...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 526px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1. Stop chord if state is high (hanging notes), BRK
2. Get chord offset from octave, J = scale, update PRT 9 (velocity)
3. On last step of loop, stop prev chord, store chord and offset
4. J = Calculate chord interval, send interval to CV 1-3
5. Set interval in i2m chord, removing offset (just used to fit CV/line 4)
6. On last step of loop, send chord to i2m, fire TR.P 1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 1006px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1. I = 3/4-note interval setting, K = IN octave
2. Set PRT 1 to harmonizer note
3. CV 4 out PRT 1, TR.P 3
4. Set I to 1 if new pitch is detected or new chord step was triggered (this allows transitional duplicate notes to trigger TR.P 4)
5. If I, TR.P 4, store current note pitch in PRT 2, store R state to J (for line 4 on next pass through)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 38px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 971px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 1486px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: 1. If IN 4 is high, set Y to 1 (reset mode) and BRK
2. I = scale selector input, J = scale value
3. If scale selector input, set scale in P 63 (just shorter than PRT LOL) and PRT 8, then BRK
(else Chord sequence BTN was pressed)
4. J = BTNV, K = BTN row
5. If BTNV = 1, BTN.SW to clear other BTNs on step
6. Write the chord value to PN 0 (set to 0 if it's a rest/tie)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 38px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 1451px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 38px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 491px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 38px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 11px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 45px; margin-left: 32px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: Subsequence Flow

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 370px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 1966px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 1. K = BTNV, I = pattern BTN T/F, J = BTNI. 8-11 Pattern setter, 12 Arrange/chord switcher, 13 Follow mode toggle, 14 Harmonizer interval toggle
2. If Follow mode BTN, set T
3. If pattern BTN, update Z (pattern), turn follow off (T 0)
4. If pattern BTN, switch off Follow BTN and run $ 6 to load pattern
5. If harmonizer interval BTN, set PRT 7 with BTN value
6. If chord/arranger switch BTN, loop lines 1&2 of $ 7 to enable/disable BTN/FDRs

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
